product_discounts.title: Product Discounts
product_discounts.description: The section to set percentage discounts, fixed quantity reductions or special pricing rules to attract customers and increase sales.

offer_orders.title: Order Offers
offer_orders.description: The section to set discounts, free shipping thresholds, or bundle promotions based on order total or specific products. Improves customer satisfaction and encourages larger purchases.

offers_to_clients.title: Customer Offers
offers_to_clients.description: The section to set personalized discounts, loyalty rewards or special promotions based on individual customer profiles. Improve customer satisfaction and build long-term relationships.

discount_coupons.title: Discount Coupons
discount_coupons.description: The section to set unique codes for specific promotions, expiration dates and define usage limits. Improve customer engagement and encourage repeat purchases.
